definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Results Food-poisoning accidents happen more frequently in the third quarter.
sentences.chinese: 結果食物中毒事故第三季度高發。

sentences.english: This new mystery show is one of the ten best of the season.
sentences.chinese: 這部新的懸念劇是這個季度十佳電視劇之一。

sentences.english: The second quarter, the continuous high card.
sentences.chinese: 二季度，重卡產銷量持續處於高位。

sentences.english: The new fine paper line will be taken into use in the first quarter of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 新的薄頁紙生產線將在2011年第一季度投入使用。

sentences.english: Itau and Unibanco release official third-quarter earnings this week.
sentences.chinese: 本週兩家銀行將正式公佈第三季度收益報告。

sentences.english: Yeah, I get homesick at least twice a quarter, I think.
sentences.chinese: 想，我每個季度至少想家兩次。

sentences.english: Cone Denim(Jiaxing) Ltd. is targeted to commence its production in the first quarter of 2007.
sentences.chinese: 嘉興康龍紡織計劃在2007年第一季度投入生產。

sentences.english: China's gold demand fell 22% in the third quarter to a four-year low.
sentences.chinese: 第三季度中國黃金需求下降22%，至四年低點。

sentences.english: The American second-quarter results season was undoubtedly better than expected.
sentences.chinese: 美國第二業績季度無疑好於預期。

sentences.english: Partly due to the delay, its first-quarter revenue forecast is now below average estimates, according to StarMine.
sentences.chinese: 由於推遲的原因，它的第一季度收入預報低於預期。

sentences.english: At the same time, Colliers said, average rents fell 9% when compared with the first quarter of the year.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，平均租金較前一季度下降9%。

sentences.english: It also comes after the company last month gave a weaker-than-expected outlook for the fiscal fourth quarter.
sentences.chinese: 博科公司上個月公佈的第四季度企業前景不如預期。

sentences.english: The company had $5.4bn of cash at the end of the second quarter.
sentences.chinese: 在第二季度末，聯合科技現金流有54億美金。

sentences.english: The filly has been raced twice this season.
sentences.chinese: 這匹小母馬本季度曾兩次參賽。

sentences.english: In the second quarter, China once again was the nation that led IPO issuance globally.
sentences.chinese: 二季度，中國再次成爲全球IPO領跑者。

sentences.english: The New York-based company is expected to post a fifth straight quarterly loss next week.
sentences.chinese: 花旗集團預計在下一週裏將連續第五個季度報虧。

definition: within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
end of month/late in the month
